SovereignLocationHandshake.instructionBody: By sharing your precise location, this trace will receive IAL3 sovereign certification, ensuring maximum weight to your voice in the territory.
SovereignLocationHandshake.securityFootnote: Data protected by Sovereign Vault via GPDR/LGPD.
SovereignLocationHandshake.logHandshakeSuccess: Success: High-fidelity coordinates sealed in the trace.
